mapper.select: SELECT * FROM flight JOIN route ON flight.route_no = route.route_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flight( flight_no, flight_name, seat_no, route_no, seat_Max, seat_remaining, seat_used ) VALUES ( #{flightNo}, #{flightName}, #{seatNo}, #{routeNo}, #{seatMax}, #{seatRemaining}, #{seatUsed} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product JOIN route ON product.route_no = route.route_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( product_id, route_no, name, product_cat, product_price, departure, destination, description, unitInStock, File ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{routeNo}, #{name}, #{productCat}, #{productPrice}, #{departure}, #{destination}, #{description}, #{unitInStock}, #{File} )
INSERT INTO product_io ( product_no, route_no, booking_no, amount, type ) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{routeNo}, #{bookingNo}, #{amount}, #{type} )
